title: Sword&Knife1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview



📖Overview.

The Sword and Knife Sound Effects Pack is an extensive collection of audio resources for games, movies, and animation projects. It includes a rich variety of sounds related to different types of swords and knives, such as Sword, Knife, Blade, ButterflyKnife, Machete, PocketKnife, SteakKnife, and more. With stereo and mono audio files provided, you can use these sounds for various purposes, from UI effects to in-game location-specific effects.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Varied Sword and Knife Sounds: This pack covers a wide range of sounds for different types of swords and knives, including Sword, Knife, Blade, ButterflyKnife, Machete, PocketKnife, SteakKnife, and more.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: Stereo and mono audio files are separated, allowing flexibility in usage for UI effects to in-game location-specific effects.
  • Versatile Applications: Suitable for various purposes in games, movies, animations, and more, especially scenes involving different types of swords and knives.



📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • Adamantium 4
  • Blade 14
  • Broken 2
  • Butterfly 20
  • CheeseKnife 7
  • CombatKnife 2
  • Dagger 14
  • Knife 83
  • Machete 42
  • Other 3
  • Plastic 8
  • PocketKnife 13
  • ShingRingy 3
  • SnowKnife 5
  • Stab 3
  • SteakKnife 4
  • Sword 376
  • WireCut 2


⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 605 (402 Mono and 402 Stereo)
  • Number of Audio Cues: 605 (402 Mono and 402 Stereo)
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 14:49
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : 0dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
